tool.name: NCBI EPost
tool.description: post UIDs to NCBI History Server
tool.command:
python '$__tool_directory__/epost.py'
$db_select
@EMAIL_ARGUMENTS@
#if $query_source.qss == "id_file": --id_list $query_source.id_file #else if $query_source.qss == "id_list": --id $query_source.id_list #else if $query_source.qss == "id_xml": --id_xml $query_source.id_xml #else if $query_source.qss == "id_json": --id_json $query_source.id_json #end if
#if $update_history.history_type == "select" and $update_history.history_entry.history_select == "history_json": --history_file "$update_history.history_entry.history_file" #else if $update_history.history_type == "select" and $update_history.history_entry.history_select == "history_xml": --history_xml "$update_history.history_entry.history_xml" #else if $update_history.history_type == "paste": --webenv "$update_history.webenv" #end if
> $history

param.name: qss
param.label: Enter Query IDs by...
param.help: Files output by ELink or ESearch are acceptable. Query IDs in an ELink result are ignored.

param.label: ID File (Text)
param.name: id_file
param.help: A Text file containing one ID per line

param.label: ID File (XML)
param.name: id_xml
param.help: ESearch or ELink Result XML file

param.label: ID File (JSON)
param.name: id_json
param.help: ESearch or ELink Result JSON file

param.name: history_type
param.label: Target History
param.help: IDs will be saved to a supplied or created history.
param.option: Add to an existing history by file
Add to an existing history by history (WebEnv) ID

param.label: History File (JSON)
param.name: history_file
param.help: A JSON file containing the WebEnv ID referencing the history on the NCBI history server to which to add the IDs

param.label: History File (XML)
param.name: history_xml
param.help: An XML file containing the WebEnv ID referencing the history on the NCBI history server to which to add the IDs
